doc.title: A King Beyond the Ring
doc.plot: Who was ever a more colorful, camera-friendly, controversial character than Muhammad Ali. He is a man unlike any other, transcending the ropes of a boxing ring into the heart and soul of millions around the globe. From his humble beginnings in Louisville, Kentucky through his fight against Parkinson's Syndrome, A King Beyond the Ring explores the life and times of not only one of the greatest boxers to ever live, but one of history's most compelling human beings.
